description: Event for recording group or mob feeding. Allowances represent averages so this cannot be used to populate individual animal events.

feedingEndingDateTime.description: The RFC3339 UTC moment from which animals could no longer consume the feed (eventDateTime represents the start of feed availability).

items.description: Gives the feed offered to and consumed per animal (average).

feedTotal.description: Gives the feed offered to and consumed (total for all animals).

items.description: Gives the ration offered to and consumed per animal (average).

rationTotal.description: Gives the feed offered to and consumed (total for all animals).

device.description: Optional information about a device used for the feeding, if relevant.
